questions.question: What framework processes large distributed datasets?
questions.explanation: Hadoop distributes data processing across clusters.

questions.question: What is Hadoop's distributed file system?
questions.explanation: HDFS stores data across multiple machines.

questions.question: What engine performs in-memory data processing?
questions.explanation: Spark processes data faster using RAM.

questions.question: What programming model divides tasks into map and reduce?
questions.explanation: MapReduce processes data in parallel stages.

questions.question: What type of database handles unstructured data?
What are the three Vs of big data?
questions.explanation: The 3 Vs characterize big data's scale and diversity.

questions.question: What tool queries Hadoop data using SQL-like syntax?
questions.explanation: Hive enables SQL queries on Hadoop data.

questions.question: What processes data as it arrives in real-time?
questions.explanation: Stream processing analyzes continuous data flows.

questions.question: What Spark component handles real-time data?
questions.explanation: Spark Streaming processes live data streams.

questions.question: What manages Hadoop cluster resources?
questions.explanation: YARN allocates resources and schedules jobs.
